action.name: Mark centre well
action.description: Mark centre well on the new location with the help of RIG xxx STE - LAYOUT GENERAL ARRANGEMENT, drawing number xxx-xxx-xxx.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls wrong dimensions wrong revision layout incorrect reading don't measure preciese enough
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 13,5 mT; WL: 4 m

riskAnalysis.danger: Blown out of the derrick, electrocuted, slipping with all its consequences
riskAnalysis.controls: Stop work in case of wind force 6 or higher, torrential rains, a 60% or higher chance of a thunderstorm and a view of less than 50 meters due to fog

riskAnalysis.danger: Dangerous situations, slips trips and falls
riskAnalysis.controls: Maintain good housekeeping (also by site responsible company), use handrails

riskAnalysis.danger: Aggressive chemicals, slips trips and falls, residue’s in mudlines
riskAnalysis.controls: Use proper PPE when cleaning the mudtanks (special gloves, coverall, spray-hood) - Read MSDS form all the additives - Isolate the mud agitators (electrical isolation) - Prepare PTW, TRIC card with HSE supervisor - Flush complete mudsystem with water

riskAnalysis.danger: Dangerous situations, slips trips and falls
riskAnalysis.controls: Maintain good housekeeping (also by site responsible company) - Slow driving on the location by forklift, crane, cars and trucks (max. 5km/h.)

riskAnalysis.danger: Hearing damage > 80 dB
riskAnalysis.controls: Use of effective/appropriate ear protectors

riskAnalysis.danger: Errors in assessing the situation
riskAnalysis.controls: Discuss before start of the particular activity.

riskAnalysis.activity: Work carried out is not in accordance with the work instructions
riskAnalysis.danger: Dangerous situations, accidents, harmful longer term consequences.
riskAnalysis.controls: Continuous supervision, a daily start-work-meeting, no specific work carried out without a work permit

riskAnalysis.danger: Inexperienced / untrained personnel. Incorrect execution of tasks.
riskAnalysis.controls: Certified and trained personnel supplied, in accordance with g and standards.

riskAnalysis.danger: Handover over incomplete and/ or wrong procedures
riskAnalysis.controls: Provide complete information, handover correct engineered information and/ or procedures

riskAnalysis.danger: Continue to lift or lower the load when this is not possible – resulting in jamming, tilting or breaking of the cable and/or load
riskAnalysis.controls: Use properly functioning walkie-talkies, preferably with a private channel. Always have a spare battery when working at height

action.name: Position shaker tank
action.description: Position cranes according lifting plan number xxxxx.xxx.xxx Lifting Plan - Shaker Tank Reverse truck with shaker tank (sand trap) on position. Attach lifting gear to the shaker tank and slowly start lifting by following the hand signals of the banksman. Lower the tank on it’s position. Check the dimensions and centre well marking. Centre well - shaker tank =40 ft 8 inch or 12,4 m Centre well - front skid shaker tank = 1 ft 11 inch or 0,585 m When the tank is in position clean and check the seals and pipe/hose connections.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging outrigger sinking in soft soil , use big mating underneath outriggers standing between load and fixed object
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 13,5 mT; WL: 4 m 2 x single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 10 mT; WL: 8,0 m (vertical position)
action.dimensions: Shale shaker tank: 13,75 x 3,5 x 3,0 m = 20 mT

riskAnalysis.danger: Food poisoning, illness
riskAnalysis.controls: Provide well prepared, thoroughly cooked and healthy food. Keep canteen clean.

riskAnalysis.danger: Bad night rest > resulting in concentration problems
riskAnalysis.controls: Have a silence policy in place, after 11 pm, reduce noises from generators, provide dark blinds for windows and keep room properly cleaned.

action.name: Install stairs shaker tank
action.description: Install the stairs to the shaker tank (sand trap). Attach lifting gear to the stairs and lift stairs in position. Make the pin connection between stairs and shaker tank. Lower the stairs on the ground. Make sure the stairs is hanging horizontal during installation
action.risks: ips , trips and falls pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel wire sling SWL: 35 mT; WL: > 2,5 m
action.dimensions: Shale shaker skid:n.a. m = 18 mT

riskAnalysis.danger: Reduced state of concentration, dangerous situations, reduced awareness and supervision effectiveness
riskAnalysis.controls: Sufficient rest time at night and breaks during the day taken by employees (guideline is 7 / 8 hours of sleep per night)

action.name: Install shaker skid
action.description: Position cranes according lifting plan number xxxxx.xxx.xxx - Lifting Plan Shaker Skid Reverse truck with shaker skid next to the shaker tank. Attach special required lifting gear to the crane and shaker skid. Start lifting slowly the shaker skid from the trailer on top of the shaker tank. Slowly lower the skid between the pin connections fixed on the shaker tank. When skid is in position install the pins. The pins need to be secured with secondary retention pins/ bolts & nuts.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging outrigger sinking in soft soil , use big mating underneath outriggers standing between load and fixed object
action.liftinggears: x shackle type G2130 SWL: 6,5 mT 2 x 2 leg chain sling SWL: 17,5 mT; WL: 3,0 m

riskAnalysis.danger: Reduced state of concentration, dangerous situations, reduced awareness and supervision effectiveness
riskAnalysis.controls: Provide sufficient food and drinks (quality and quantity)

action.name: Install suction & discharge lines mud cleaner
action.description: Install one by one the discharge and suction line between the mud cleaner and the lines on the shaker tank. Make sure spare seals for flange connection and rubber seal for mud cleaner connection are available. Position the line on the flange and install 2 or 3 bolts and nuts , hand tight. Fix the coupling between pipe and mud cleaner. When that connection is tight install all the bolts and nuts of the flange connection
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging outrigger sinking in soft soil , use big mating underneath outriggers standing between load and fixed object
action.liftinggears: x shackles Type G2130 SWL: 8,5 mT 4 x web sling SWL: 3,0 mT; WL: 5,0 m
action.dimensions: Intermediate tank:13,6 x 3,05 x 3,0 m = 25 mT

riskAnalysis.danger: Sunburn
riskAnalysis.controls: Protect your skin for sunburn (clothing, long sleeves) - Use anti sunburn cream

action.name: Install roof shaker tank
action.description: Install all the roof sections on the shaker tank. Attach the lifting gear to each corner of the roof panel. Lift the roof panel 1,5 meter of the ground and install 4 supports. Secure supports with nuts and bolts. Lift the roof section on top of the shaker tank and position the supports in the pockets. Secure the roof panels with bolt and nuts. Start from the access stairs towards the direction of the mud cleaner.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging standing between load and fixed object Suspended loads
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 10,0 mT; WL: 8,0 m

riskAnalysis.controls: Third party inspection takes place prior to rigmove (2 or 3 weeks before) at rigmovers yard - Cranes shall have a valid third party inspection sticker and certificate. - Any slight oil leakage from outriggers pistons and boom pistons to be repaired prior transportation

riskAnalysis.danger: Faulty equipment
riskAnalysis.controls: Third party inspection takes place prior to rigmove (2 or 3 weeks before) at rigmovers yard - Cranes shall have a valid third party inspection sticker and certificate. - Any slight oil leakage from outriggers pistons and boom pistons to be repaired prior transportation

action.name: Position degasser , Sand and Silt tank
action.description: Position cranes according lifting plan number xxxxx.xxx.xxx Lifting Plan Degasser Tank Reverse truck with degasser/sand/silt tank in position. Attach lifting gear to the degasser/sand/silt tank and slowly start lifting by following the hand signals of the banksman. Lower the tank on it’s position with the skids against each other and proper aligned. When the tank is in position clean and check the seals and pipe/hose connections. Install the pipes/hoses between shaker and degasser/sand/ silt tank. When all the pipes and hoses are connected turnover the platform between both tanks.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging standing between load and fixed object diesel fuel spill wrong dimensions
action.liftinggears: x shackles Type G2130 SWL: 6,45 mT
action.dimensions: Reserve tank 1: 13,75 x 3,05 x 3,0 m = 19 mT

riskAnalysis.danger: Safety equipment / installations (LMB, brakes, etc.), outrigger out of order
riskAnalysis.controls: Mobilize third party inspector on site and inspect all cranes before commencing mobilisation operations/ transport - Check cranes on site according daily/ weekly checklist cranes (HSE procedure Manual g – Saudi Arabia, procedure 4.2.a: crane procedures, Chapter V, Inspection requirements

action.name: Install vacuum degasser
action.description: Remove the first roof section from the degasser/sand/silt tank. Install the vacuum degasser on top of the tank. Connect the pipes to the vacuum degasser. The vacuum degasser is pinned to the tank. Install the roof section back on the tank and secure with bolts and nuts. Remark: In case there are no height restrictions the vacuum degasser can stay on the tank and doesn’t need to be removed.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Manual Handling pinch points incorrect slinging standing between load and fixed object
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 13,5 mT; WL: 4 m
action.dimensions: Mix/suction tank: 13,6 x 3,05 x 3,0 m = 24 mT

riskAnalysis.danger: Faulty equipment / Faulty attachments (fork. Boom
riskAnalysis.controls: Third party inspection takes place prior to rigmove (2 or 3 weeks before) at rigmovers yard - All attached equipment shall be OEM recommended and in good working condition - Having a valid MOPI certificate of critical areas - Inspect forklift on arrival and eliminate likelihood of usage of unsafe equipment (HSE procedure Manual g – Saudi Arabia, procedure 4.2.b: Safety requirements in forklift operations, Chapter III, Daily inspection of forklift trucks

action.name: Position Intermediate tank
action.description: Position cranes according lifting plan number 13063.001.005 - Lifting Plan Intermediate Tank Reverse truck with intermediate tank in position. Attach lifting gear to the intermediate tank and slowly start lifting by following the hand signals of the banksman. Lower the tank on it’s position with the skids against each other and proper aligned. When the tank is in position clean and check the seals and pipe/hose connections. Install the pipes/hoses between degasser/sand/silt and intermediate tank. When all the pipes and hoses are connected turn-over the platform between both tanks.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging
action.liftinggears: x shackle type G2130 SWL: 3,75 mT
action.dimensions: Stairs: 5,03 x 1,07 x 1,02 m = n.a. mT

riskAnalysis.danger: Incompetent personnel
riskAnalysis.controls: All operators shall obtain valid SAG and license and fit to work certificates - The additional forklift and crane operators mobilized for the rig move shall have past experience in rig moves - A part of the basic induction, they shall be fully introduced and trained on the rig procedures; they shall be replaced if rig senior supervisors aren’t confident about their skills and capabilities - Rigger-1 shall hold a valid Rigger-1 certificate and fit to work certificate (HSE procedure Manual g – Saudi Arabia, procedure 4.2.c: safety requirements in Rigging and lifting)

riskAnalysis.danger: Faulty equipment
riskAnalysis.controls: Third party inspection takes place prior to rigmove (2 or 3 weeks before) at rigmovers yard - All attached equipment shall be OEM recommended and in good working condition - Having a valid MOPI certificate of critical areas - Inspect trucks/trailer on arrival and eliminate likelihood of usage of unsafe equipment

action.name: Install stall stairs to intermediate tank
action.description: Install the stairs to the intermediate tank. First turn-over platform for the stairs and install two platform supports on the side of the tank. Attach lifting gear to the stairs and lift stairs in position. Make the pin connection between stairs and shaker tank. Lower the stairs on the ground. Make sure the stairs is hanging horizontal during installation
action.risks: ips , trips and falls pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 10,0 mT; WL: 8,0 m (basket hitch)
action.dimensions: Supercharge skid: 9,25 x 2,6 x 3,1 m = n.a mT

action.name: Position reserve tank #x
action.description: Position cranes according lifting plan number xxxxx.xxx.xxx- Lifting Plan Reserve Tank #x Reverse truck with reserve tank #x in position. Attach lifting gear to the reserve tank #x and slowly start lifting by following the hand signals of the banksman. Lower the reserve tank #x with the skid against the cable corridor and the side of the tank against the distance bars of the intermediate tank. When the reserve tank #1 is in position clean and check the seals and pipe/hose connections. Install the pipes/hoses between intermediate and reserve tank plus reserve tank #1 and cable corridor. When all the pipes and hoses are connected turn-over the platforms in between the tanks and cable corridor.
action.risks: d residue's Additional PPE Get unconcious Falling of tools, Barrier of working area and use of lanyards of tools working at height,use of safety belt with twin hook fall arrestor and man lift standing between load and fixed object standing between load and moving object

action.description: Position cranes according lifting plan number xxxxx.xxx.xxx- Lifting Plan Charge Pump Skid Reverse truck with charge pump skid in position. Attach lifting gear to the charge pump skid and slowly start lifting by following the hand signals of the banksman. Lower the charge pump skid next to the suction tank. Make the connections have been cleaned, checked and greased before connecting

action.name: Position cement water tank #x & #x
action.description: Position cranes according lifting plan number xxxxx.xxx.xxx - Lifting plan Water tanks (Cement) Reverse truck with cement water tank #x in position. Attach lifting gear to the water tank and slowly start lifting by following the hand signals of the banksman. Lower the cement water tank close to the end of the LP ground suitcases. Lower the tank on the ground and connect the lines/hoses between suitcase and charge pumps on the skid of cement water tank #x. Check coupling and seal before connecting the lines/hoses. Position cement water tank # x close to cement water tank #x. Install between the tanks some (dis)charge lines. Align the tank proper and lower to the ground.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Manual Handling pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging outrigger sinking in soft soil , use big mating underneath outriggers standing between load and fixed object

action.name: Unload and position centrifuges
action.description: Unload and position centrifuges. Unload and position the VFD control cabinet skid close to the degasser, sand and silt tank. The position of the container is specified by the charge and discharge lines from the mud system to the centrifugal pumps on the skid. Connect flange of the lines to the centrifugal pumps. Unload an position centrifuges skid on top of the VFD cabinet skid. The skid had guides on top for the centrifuges skid. Lower the skid on top and release the crane. Install the drip trays manual underneath the centrifuges and connect the centrifuges with the VFD cabinets.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's Manual Handling pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging outrigger sinking in soft soil , use big mating underneath outriggers standing between load and fixed object
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 13,5 mT; WL: 8,0 m 2 x single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 10 mT; WL: 8,0 m (vertical position)

action.name: Unload and position Trip tank
action.description: Unload and position Trip tank next to the shaker tank. Position cranes according lifting plan number xxxxx.xxx.xxx - Lifting plan Trip Tank The trip tank can only be positioned when the mast and substructure are raised. The position of the trip tanks is specified by the mud return line and the stairs from rigfloor to trip tank. When the tank is in position connect all the hose and lines between shaker tank and trip tank. On top of the trip tanks two platforms and x stairs need to be installed. The platforms and stairs are all pinned. When the pins are installed install the secondary retention pins.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's Manual Handling pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging outrigger sinking in soft soil , use big mating underneath outriggers standing between load and fixed object
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel wire sling SWL: 35 mT; WL: 8 m

action.name: Unload and position Poor-boy
action.description: Unload and position poor-boy degasser next to the shaker tank. Tilt the poor-boy degasser from horizontal in to vertical position. The distance between both skids is depending on the dump line of the poor-boy into the header box of the shale shakers. When the poor-boy is standing to close to the shaker tank it can be re-positioned with help of a wheel loader.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's Manual Handling pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging outrigger sinking in soft soil , use big mating underneath outriggers standing between load and fixed object

step.name: install all the power cables to the MCC - house

action.name: Install all the power cables to the MCC house
action.description: Connect all the electrical cables from the mud tanks and auxiliary equipment to MCC container. Unroll the electrical cables up and attach them to the cable tray on the tank. Install the main cable tray on the interconnecting cable skid with help of a crane. Turn the cable boom of suction and intermediate tank in the direction of the MCC container. Check during the pluging in of the cables and plug if there is any damage.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Manual Handling pinch points Electrocution
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel wire sling SWL: 35 mT; WL: 8 m

action.name: Install all the air lines
action.description: Connect the air hoses by connecting the hammer union and/ or quick connector couplings. During connecting the couplings check for damage of the coupling and hoses. In case there is damage repair or replace as soon as possible. Make sure there are enough spares in the stores.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Manual Handling pinch points Pressurized system
action.liftinggears: x 2-leg steel-wire sling SWL: 10 mT; WL: 1,0 m (iron roughneck specific)

action.name: Install cutting ditches
action.description: Position the cutting ditches from underneath the shakers in the direction of the centrifuges to the cutting pit. The cutting ditches can be positioned with either a crane or a wheel loader. It depends on the position of the cutting pit.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Mud residue's Manual Handling pinch points Crane/ Wheel load driver is not following sinalsDamage to personnel and / or equipment incorrect slinging standing between load and fixed object
action.liftinggears: x shackle Type G2130 SWL: 4,75 mT

action.name: Install PAGA system
action.description: Position and connect all the electrical cables from several speaker and gas alarm units. Unroll the cables from the poles to the main switch panel. Fix the cables with some tie-wraps to the pole and handrails. Check the system afterwards
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Manual Handling pinch points Electrocution
action.liftinggears: x 2 single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 13,5 mT; WL: 8,0 m 2 x single leg steel-wire sling SWL: 10,0 mT; WL: 8,0 m

action.name: Install cascade system
action.description: Position & connect all the cascade airlines and stations. Unroll all the hoses and stow/secure them with tie-wraps along the route to the breathing air compressor/cylinders. Position all the emergency cascade sets (15 min) on the mudsystem. After installation check the system.
action.risks: ips , trips and falls Manual Handling pinch points
action.liftinggears: x 2-leg chain sling SWL: 17,5 mT; WL: 3 m
